channel.title: Need Help!
channel.description:
i am getting so mad cuzz i dont know wat im doing. i want to know how to like be spawn monsters and make items pop up and be the only 1 who can do it. i also want to know how to make things like were you type ::2m and u get 2,000,000 i am pretty much saying i need help editing like the client thing. plz some1 help me.
p.s i dont know really what to type, were to type it and stuff like that

item.title: Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

Editing it pretty much copying and pasting. For itemrespawns, go to your file named “itemspawnpoints” and for monters go to “autospawn” file. You should be able to catch on from there.

Read full topic
